segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the sink is completely clogged, and she doesn’t even realize it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and her foot is already in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around to see the mess yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are about to make things even worse with that stupid stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice what’s going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is just waiting for something bad to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops this before it gets out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR
